page.title: 03A FAMILY WEEKEND (CONT)
page.content:
home and mum makes dinner.The appliance that cooks our dinner and tea is called a cooker.They can run from gas or electricity. My mum's runs on gas.We usually have chips and sausages. My brother is 2 years old and his name is Sean.My name is Stephanie.I am 10 years old.I don't watch television on Saturday mornings and afternoons because there's only sport on.I will go and call for my friends and go down the playing fields. For tea I have beans on toast.After tea I go out again until it is 8.00 pm. I get undressed and go downstairs to watch television.The things I watch are DYNASTY which is a soap opera and KENNY EVERETT who is a comedian.
SUNDAY In the morning I lay in bed then get
